tasks.title: Assess repo-config contract alignment
tasks.description: multirepo benchmark scenario: Assess repo-config contract alignment.

workflow.goal: Localize the highest-impact code paths quickly.
workflow.prompt: Triage task: Assess repo-config contract alignment. Identify the primary modules and likely risk hotspots.

workflow.goal: Trace control/data flow across the relevant components.
workflow.prompt: Investigate task: Assess repo-config contract alignment. Follow request-to-effect flow and find likely failure/regression points.

workflow.goal: Define verification criteria and regression checks.
workflow.prompt: Validate task: Assess repo-config contract alignment. List tests and checks that prove the issue is solved without regressions.
